## Data Visualisation

- [Datawrapper](https://www.datawrapper.de), for creating interactive and responsive charts and maps
- [Data Viz Project](https://datavizproject.com), for data visualisation inspiration
- [Wado Sanzo](https://sanzo-wada.dmbk.io), a dictionary of colour combinations

## Accessibility

- [Coblis](https://www.color-blindness.com/coblis-color-blindness-simulator), a colour-blind simulator to check figures for accessibility
